0: A pool under development and some greater choice quality for breakfast could complete probably what can easily be the best choice both for business or leisure short stays while in Nairobi
I would have definitely recommended this hotel to others had they treated me better upon arrival
along the lines of a Hilton Executive club so I booked a Club room
Arranged an airport pickup was promised an Porsche Cayenne in the reservation paperwork got a small Mercedes instead I am a big guy so was a bit cramped
So much to see and do in Nairobi that you will not spend much time at the hotel
Even with the hotel full there was always a table available in the bar and restaurant
Just want to do a shout out for Beatrice Brian and Margaret

1: This is to register my gratitude with compliments and appreciation for the service and care I received at The Dusit D2 Nairobi
Surely Dusit Nairobi you are amazing
They have the best service and I loved the interior decor
We had a wonderful stay the previous year and valued the mini break and the indulgence of a nice hotel stay over News Years
Had an amazing experience and service from Darwin was exceptional would highly recommend it
My girls and I had such a wonderful and unforgettable experience at the Zing restaurant
Zing bar the ambience is out of this world I was served by the lovely Angel Riviera very friendly and it felt like home
Stayed for a week at Dusit D2 while on work visit last month
Fancy location Great for drinks Food is nice also They have amazing pools
